name: donsoze
text: Roast Beef looks  like he's on his way to a seizure in the first panel.

name: mira
text: Those assholes knew he was making moussaka tonight!

name: shmuckeles
text: Yeah, woah! I never saw a dude get so annoyed that noone showed up for his moussaka. I never expected beef to be so hot-tempered

name: jackparsons
text: I cook for you, you show the hell up or I kill you. Face down in the moussaka except I would never cook a vegetable that tastes like rubber and battery acid.

name: jlynes
text: Well, sure, if you don't purge the eggplant first.

name: kaithekender
text: Moussaka requires a strong sense of eggplants.

name: shinkusan
text: The eggplants are strong in this one.

name: abe
text: You have obviously never sat around drinking Ouzo for 2 hours on an empty stomach.

name: bixschmix
text: Tantalizing odor of moussaka wafting around your head, gut rumbling all ouzo-dissatisfied...

name: sock
text: Beef's apparently an angry drunk. All waiting for hours for those assholes to come eat his moussaka, all getting drunk on ouzo.

name: gitarooman
text: You obviously do not know what it is to be drunk on ouzo

name: zem
text: A comment left by zem was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Chetyre, riotdejaneiro, dropkickpikachu)

name: catachresis
text:
Damn dogg I think you have called that one.
HERE BEGINS THE HUNT FOR THE OTHER FOUR RATINGS BUTTONS

name: catachresis
text:
Oh actually man the mouth is different
My bad

name: dumase
text:
Maybe ju an' me are amigos

Minus the moustache.

name: jonmw
text:
Well, it just means that we have to hunt for the FIVE RATINGS BUTTONS instead.
I'm pretty sure that the comic where he picks up the tech magazine for himself and Molly in heaven would look pretty dang close to #5.

name: sargasm
text: After you've watched a butt get stabbed for something like hours, nothing hits the spot like some moussaka.

name: saint
text: i wouldn't have much of an appetite at all.

name: indoorsman
text: All with that sauce ...

name: overmedicated
text: Bit of a Pat moment for Beef there, you think?

name: patiently56
text: he had been drinking ouzo for two hours.

name: riazm
text: When people do not eat his food, Beef hits the booze.

name: chrissketch
text: Who drinks ouzo?

name: pa_ass_nts
text: People who aren't capable of feeling any worse inside. Greeks have also been known to drink it.

name: nigelchaos
text: Beat me to that. I was going to also point out that with Beef serving Moussaka, it looks like it was Greek night (yeah. I had to Wikipedia everything.)

name: perilon
text: My dad said that is why Greek people die early

name: tekende
text: What else does your dad say

name: theguitarhero
text: Wanna meet that dad.

name: gibby23
text: Well played, guitar hero. I mean, Great Job!

name: saint
text: Doo duh doo doo.

name: tfaironpirate
text: Which is why, you know, Greece has the 18th highest life expectancy in the world, beating out both the US and the UK.

name: dusty
text: We've got some extra jokes left over here if you decide you want to get some of them.

name: tfaironpirate
text: Yeah, sorry, I was on a Greece kick right then. I apologize to the Pig and Business Casual Cat.

name: dusty
text: That's ok, we all have days when we wake up feeling unusually Greecy.

name: spinynorman
text: Anise liquors should all just have the label "Fuck You Up Juice"

name: perilon
text: Let's be glad Beef was not into the tsipouro or the raki that night.

name: spinynorman
text:
Hey, raki!

I had a bunch of Turkish friends who drank raki. When I drank it one night I was awoken in the morning by my friend shouting at me because I had used his prayer mat as a makeshift bed, which was "so very sacreligious.

name: i_love_kate
text: I was up until 3 in the morning today, drinking pastis and memorising my presentation for a French exam, and thus I can imagine quite easily that your head wouldn't have been in the best of conditions for appreciating your social misconduct.

name: heccibiggs
text: When I drank raki, I threw up bright yellow the next morning. Not just icky carroty little lumps, or phlegmy strains. Just loads of yolk-coloured vomit. Can anyone offer me a scientific explanation? Or was it just the product of the malevolent forces in my stomach?

name: tekende
text: It's because you touch yourself at night.

name: tonyhighwind
text:
I'm going with malevolent forces. I have never thrown up yolk-yellow upchuck, and it sounds like a truly horrifying experience.

Seriously, my breakfast is acting like it might want to come up just thinking about it.

name: stubob
text: There's witchcraft afoot!

name: userbeliever
text: arak is where it's at.

name: alephnought
text: I SAW MATT DAMON DRINKING SOME IN A MAGAZINE

name: shutup_shutup
text: Greek people?

name: blarghamagarky
text: he is from circumstances he does not like to waste food

name: epicurus
text: Anytime I get hurt somehow and someone asks me how I am, I tell them I'm breathin' but my brain and ass cheek are hella stabbed.

name: _cheesekayke
text: Dude, do you ever say anything that isn't from Achewood? Not to be rude, I am impressed at your apparent ability to recall dozens of Achewood quotes and instantly recognize the appropriate situation in which to use them.

name: epicurus
text: Hey thanks.

name: error23
text: I have actually been able to identify other Achewood fans based upon their syntax.  Achewood readers have a recognizable parlance.

name: blarghamagarky
text: this happens a lot when you are in college

name: orvel
text:
All starting clauses with the word "all"
All using "such as" whenever possible

name: puguglypress
text: All with that sauce

name: zefiel
text: Wait wait wait, where are they? Ray's place? where'd those fancy fixtures for hanging people come from?

name: asherdan
text: A comment left by asherdan was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by joeyramoney, riotdejaneiro, clancine, electricjelly, luckypyjamas, Crater12, blarghamagarky, J-Man)

name: zefiel
text: I might be spoiled by the Insane amounts of correct continuity Onstad provides with the material.

name: vreeeee
text: You don't have those in your home?

name: squi
text: We're talking about a cat and a teddy bear - Nice Pere could have easily procured some adhesive hoat-hooks, stuck them to the wall and they'd be enough to hold Ray & T.

name: squi
text: Make that coat hooks.

name: greenkoolayd
text: and pe t e

name: mangtastic
text: Nice Pete probably has them stored in his van, for using at any old time.

name: 1000hz
text:
I laughed solidly for seven minutes after reading
"his ass cheek and brain are hella stabbed."

name: spinynorman
text: This is the way I open all of my doors.

name: patware
text: Beef opens that door in the manner of a furious man who is still in control of his Humor Drive.

name: speedwell
text: Ray is hella subtle

name: johnfen
text: This is funny cause I once made a moussaka and my roommates didn't show up and I was hella angry. I called them moussaka motherfuckers. I'm beef's human counterpart! (I ain't from circumstances though)

name: scott_335
text: Has anyone noticed that  Roast Beef gets real uppity when moussaka is involved?

name: galbraith
text: I wish that his moussaka had been in the cookbook, although I guess it was since that book came out that it was established that this is Beef's specialty.  I think that's all he makes besides galaxy nachos.

name: buttermoths
text:
Roast Beef opens that door like a very drunk man (or cat), but seems to painfully sober up immediately in panel 7. I would too.
Also, what's the deal with Teodor sticking his tongue out at Beef in panel 6? Has watching a Nice Pete's ass cheeks and brain being repeatedly stabbed for hours caused some sort of dementia?
(Well, it might be his lower lip, but the tongue nicely complements Ray's curiously unaffected comment.)

name: neitherman
text: It looks like his lower lip since he'd be grateful Beef showed up.  So grateful that his mouth would be agape in a wide smile.

name: quantumcasaba
text:
This strip is glorious.
Panels three and four are easily overlooked, but they are awesome.

name: jandruff
text: oh my shit I was drinking water while reading Beef's outrage and swallowed too much to keep from choking, and now I am in pain and tears but it feels good.

name: stormagnet
text: I hear you, sister. I have done that with whiskey, and oh my god the pain. Achewood is dangerous .

name: nigelchaos
text: And.. Since I haven't done an "ass pun" since Teodor died.. THAT LOOKS LIKE A PAIN IN THE ASS!

name: daidai
text: Is that a pun? I thought puns were plays on words?

name: numberkillinger
text: I guess a play on a phrase could count as a pun. Also the pun was awful.

name: nigelchaos
text: I know that. And it's a pun because.. oh.. I lost already. I surrender.

name: greenkoolayd
text: humility chibb

name: the_voice
text: Ray is totally right. I would not want to wake up if my ass an brain were that stabbed

name: phy
text: Every time I read this I think I want to try some moussaka. If it's worth getting furious and calling out all of the assholes over it's probably a pretty good meal of food.

name: lrosetw8
text: Oh it is so good, my friend. So. Good.

name: lrosetw8
text: All with that sauce ...

name: sirlucas
text:
Panel three: Does he use the door handle?

Panel four: HE DOES NOT.

name: pan-optic
text: ray's speech in the last panel is glorious beyond any reasonable expectation.

name: biznart
text: I guess you guys had run retardo off by the time this initially ran?  Otherwise, I can't imagine he'd have missed an opportunity to speculate what a machine furiously poking a dude in the ass represented.

name: greenkoolayd
text: stabbing and poking are 2 different things, mrs. evans.

name: ouroboros
text: Roast Beef does not knock.

name: 7th_shot
text: When assholes don't eat your moussaka, you are excused from knocking.

name: atypicaloracle
text: Actually he did knock. Once. Very, very hard.

name: atypicaloracle
text: I am pretty sure that Beef was going to completely destroy the upper part of someone's body over this dinner he made. I'm talking absolute glorious ruin from the belt up.

name: subactuality
text: The way Beef slams the door open after winding up makes me just so happy.  Just so happy.
